remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is integrable" when ` F ` is a mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
isibl.1 $e |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ T ) , T , 0 ) ) ) $.
isibl.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> T = ( Re ` ( B / ( _i ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
isibl2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
isibl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 <-> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn /\ A. k e. ( 0 ... 3 ) ( S.2 ` G ) e. RR ) ) ) $.
$d A k x $.
$d B k $.
$d V x $.
$d k ph x $.
